page.title: 09Education in Four Oaks.
page.content: Our school is called Four Oaks First School. It is in Edge Hill Road. The head teacher is called Mrs Edge. The school was opened on January 8th 1962.There are two playgrounds and a wildlife garden where you can find lots of insects. There are eight teachers to teach 112 boys and 98 girls. This year each class is called after birds.168 children buy milk at playtime.194 have school lunch, 5 have sandwiches.14 go home. I stay for lunch. My favourite dinner is fish fingers and chips. We have a big patch of grass where we play and run.There are lots of unusual trees. We start school when we are 4 and leave to go to the middle school at 8. Our class has been to the library,theatre,park and Shugborough Hall on visits. Once a week we have the large apparatus in the hall for P.E.We swim at Hill West.
